title: 3 Keys to Power Self Talk
itunes:title: 3 Keys to Power Self Talk
description:
The way you talk to yourself in your head will dictate the reality that you create. That is why it is so important to know HOW to talk to yourself. In this episode, I will teach you my 3 keys to creating powerful self talk and affirmations.

Follow me on Instagram for more motivation @RobDialJr https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
